summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Water Department, authorizing the granting of restrictive covenants to Harold E. and Rebecca L. Engstrom and to Charles J. and Patsy L. Dinkelspiel across a portion of the City's Lake Youngs Supply Line in Government Lot 3 of Section 22, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W.M., and a portion of the City's Walsh Lake Diversion Ditch in the southeast quarter of Section 13, Township 22 North, Range 6 East, W.M., respectively.
